name: Battle Poker
description:
Battle Poker is a family friendly card game in which players battle against the clock to make the best five card hands possible.
Battles are played across multiple rounds with points scored for each round based on the quality of the hands.
Game Modes:
Shuffle Up and Deal With it:
Re-Arrange the cards into the best combinations of rows and columns to get the best scoring hands. Move to a card witj the D-Pad or Analog Stick and press the X Button, then select another card and press the X button again, The two cards will swap positions.
Chain Reaction:
Select a card with the D-Pad or Analog Stick and press the X Button to start a chain, then move to adjacent cards until tou have made (up to) a five-card hand. Once you’ve selected the last card in the chain, press the X Button to capture that hand.
